text: The men's 50 metres event at the 1967 European Indoor Games was held on 11 and 12 March in Prague. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Pasquale Giannattasio '''' |Aleksandr Lebedev '''' |Viktor Kasatkin '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Held on 11 March First 3 from each heat (Q) qualified directly for the semifinals. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Heat !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
